dct_title_s: Sinus Gangeticus, vulgo Golfo de Bengala nova descriptio
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:4,400,000. Relief shown pictorially. Oriented with north to the right. From Visscher's Atlas minor, 1717. Dimensions: 46 x 53 centimeters
dcat_keyword_sm: Bengal, Bay of Maps Early Works to 1800
